alert.note: Alert for Warren (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 10:03AM EDT until April 09 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River At North Creek. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Water reaches minor flood stage and inundates low areas including portions of Old River Road upstream of the Route 28N bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM EDT Friday the stage was 9.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 10.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.1 feet on 04/01/1986. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River North Creek Flood Stage: 10.0 Observed Stage at Fri 9 am: 9.8 Forecast: Fri 2 pm 10.1 Fri 8 pm 10.0 Sat 2 am 9.8 Sat 8 am 9.5 Sat 2 pm 9.3 Sat 8 pm 9.0 Sun 2 am 8.7 Sun 8 am 8.5 Sun 2 pm 8.2 Sun 8 pm 7.9 Mon 2 am 7.6 &&
